name: Princess D and the Revolution
description:
Description:
The world has fallen under control of the Gloomies. It is up to Princess D and her fellow princesses to combat the Gloomies and bring happiness back to all the land.

Number of players: 1 - 4

Controls (Xbox Controllers):
Movement - Left analog stick
Attack - A
Block - B
Right trigger - Taunt (currently broken)

Credits:
Creative Director - Bret Measor
Art Director - Melissa Davidson
Senior Programmer - Thomas Martin
Artist - Colin Janowicz
Audio - Jake Butineau

Technology Used:
Unity 5.2.2f1
DOTween
Photoshop
